attributes.action: Put timer on traffic light with camera! Avoid crossing on red with hgv.
attributes.additional_details: Always i get scared about this traffic light.
attributes.background: I am very stresed when crossing traffic light with camera because color change very fast.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it sounds like you are worried about a particular set of traffic lights. This would be the responsiblity of your local council and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you.

You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
